author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Get rid of a bunch of issues reported by the static analyzer during the automatic PR tests.
The fixes _per se_ weren't really strictly necessary: on the other hand, getting rid of 24 warnings can help identifying and fixing possibly new real issues that show up during the code development.

#### PR validation:

It builds
No changes are expected
title: Avoid nested dead assignments, as reported by the static analyzer
